content.html: Woke is not an insult. Woke is not an expletive. Woke just means that you give a shit about other people's feelings and you refuse to tolerate disrespect of people from marginalized communities. I'm PROUDLY Woke.
content.value:
Woke is not an insult.
Woke is not an expletive.

Woke just means that you give a shit about other people's feelings and you refuse to tolerate disrespect of people from marginalized communities.

I'm PROUDLY Woke.
